Search for Artworks from the Art Institute of Chicago API

Source: R/artworks.R
search_artworks.Rd

Searches for artworks in the Art Institute of Chicago's collection based on a query string and returns artwork data for matching items.

Usage

search_artworks(query, fields = NULL, size = 10)

Arguments

query

A character string containing the search query. Cannot be NULL. Spaces will automatically be converted to hyphens.

fields

An optional vector of field names (character) to return for each artwork. If NULL (default), returns all available fields.

size

The maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 10.

Value

A tibble (data frame) where each row represents one artwork matching the search criteria and columns contain the requested fields.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Search for artworks related to "sunflowers"
search_artworks("sunflowers")

# Search with specific fields to return
search_artworks("monet", fields = c("title", "artist_display", "date_display"))

# Search with a larger result set
search_artworks("landscape", size = 25)
} # }
